properties.displayName: [Preview]: Reserve Bank of India - IT Framework for Banks
properties.description: This initiative includes policies that address a subset of Reserve Bank of India IT Framework for Banks controls. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/rbiitfbanks-initiative.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Key Vaults should use private link
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: The Deny effect has been deprecated for this policy given that the simultaneous creation of a Key Vault and its associated private endpoint is not possible. Therefore, Deny prevents the creation of any new Key Vault.
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Certificates should have the specified maximum validity period
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Public network access should be disabled for PostgreSQL flexible servers
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Key vaults should have soft delete enabled
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Storage accounts should be migrated to new Azure Resource Manager resources
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Hotpatch should be enabled for Windows Server Azure Edition VMs
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match; for more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Storage accounts should disable public network access
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Web Application Firewall (WAF) should enable all firewall rules for Application Gateway
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure firewall policy should enable TLS inspection within application rules
metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated

metadata.displayName: Azure Spring Cloud SKUs that should use network injection
metadata.description: List of Azure Spring Cloud SKUs against which this policy will be evaluated.

metadata.displayName: API Management SKUs that should use a virtual network
metadata.description: List of API Management SKUs against which this policy will be evaluated.

metadata.displayName: Include AKS clusters when auditing if virtual machine scale set diagnostic logs are enabled
metadata.description: For more information, visit https://aka.ms/kubepolicydoc

metadata.displayName: Include Arc-connected servers when evaluating guest configuration policies
metadata.description: By selecting 'true,' you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine; for more information, visit https://aka.ms/policy-pricing

metadata.displayName: Maximum validity (months) for Key Vault certificates
metadata.description: The limit for how long a Key Vault certificate may be valid; Azure best practices recommend against certificates with lengthy validity periods

metadata.displayName: Required mode for Web Application Firewall policies for Application Gateway
metadata.description: Mode required for all WAF policies

metadata.displayName: Compliance status to report for Windows machines with OS versions where Windows Defender Exploit Guard is not available
metadata.description: Windows Defender Exploit Guard is only available starting with Windows 10/Windows Server with update 1709. Setting this value to 'Non-Compliant' shows machines with older versions on which Windows Defender Exploit Guard is not available (such as Windows Server 2012 R2) as non-compliant. Setting this value to 'Compliant' shows these machines as compliant.

metadata.displayName: Required retention period (days) for resource logs
Name of the resource group for Network Watcher
metadata.description: Name of the resource group where Network Watchers are located, Ex: NetworkWatcherRG
